tha-ap186:2.4: paggaṇhiṁ vatasiddhiyā → puttomhi hitasiddhiyā (sya1ed, sya2ed); mūgomhi vata siddhiyā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap186:3.3: Buddharaṁsīhi phuṭṭhosmi → buddharaṁsyābhiphuṭṭhomhi (bj); buddharaṁsīhi phuṭṭhomhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); buddharaṁsābhighuṭṭhomhi (pts-vp-pli1); buddharaṁsābhighuṭṭhosmi (mr)
